document.full_text: haiti's exiled former president jean-bertrand aristide said on thursday he will be returning home before sunday's presidential run-off election, despite opposition from the united states.
document.title: aristide says he's returning home to haiti
lines_and_colors: haiti's exiled former president jean-bertrand aristide said on thursday he will be returning home before sunday's presidential run-off election, despite opposition from the united states.
